notes.text:
The combos this deck can  achieve is nuts. My ideal opening hand is Rose Lover, Komushroomo, E Con, and any Lv 6, 7, or 8 monster. If you can identify what kind of deck your opponent is playing when going second Rose Lover is a great opening card. Otherwise when going first Komushroomo is almost always better esp without pertection from an E Con. Having Komushroomo mill Carrot or a Rose Lover is almost always a win. The stars of the deck without question is Rose Lover, Carrot, and Marina(just for the SSA match up).

In my KOG run I played 2 Legendary Fisherman/SSA decks, 1 Saffira/CA, and 2 Destiny Heroes. Honestly I started at 0 games legend 1 and made it to the KOG match and lost to a OTK mirror match. Then I won my next 4 games and lost to an OTK  Weevile burn. Then I dominated my next 5 matches for KOG.
